site.title: Narcolepsy Hypothesis
site.description: A scientific hypothesis exploring the connection between intraneuronal vaccine injection, ganglioside transport, and post-vaccination narcolepsy following the 2009 H1N1 pandemic.

hero.title: The Axonal Highway Hypothesis
hero.subtitle: Exploring how intraneuronal vaccine injection may trigger narcolepsy through ganglioside-mediated transport to the hypothalamus

hypothesis.title: The Hypothesis
hypothesis.intro: A novel explanation for post-vaccination narcolepsy based on neuronal transport mechanisms

gangliosides.title: Ganglioside Metabolism
gangliosides.subtitle: Interactive pathway for biosynthesis and lysosomal degradation

genetics.title: Genetic Factors
genetics.subtitle: HLA genes, neuraminidase locus, and GT1B regulation

transport.title: Neuronal Transport
transport.subtitle: How substances with ganglioside affinity reach the spinal cord
